paper_abstract: This paper deals with the robust control problem for stochastic Hopfield neural networks subject to uncertainties and time-varying delays. A robust decentralized adaptive sliding mode controller is designed to guarantee the uncertain stochastic delayed Hopfield neural networks is globally asymptotically stable in probability. A numerical example is given to show the effectiveness of the proposed controller. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Robust decentralized adaptive control for stochastic delayed Hopfield neural networks
